name: Abdullah Al-Shehri
title: Junior Software Developer
summary: Junior developer focused on building clean, reliable software and learning modern web technologies.

highlights: Built reusable React components and utility hooks to speed up feature delivery by ~20%.
Collaborated with designers to implement responsive layouts and accessibility fixes (WCAG 2.1 AA).
Integrated REST APIs and improved client-side error handling for a smoother user experience.
Prototyped internal dashboards with vanilla JS and charting libraries to visualize KPI trends.
Automated data cleanup scripts in Node.js, reducing manual report prep time by 30%.
Documented onboarding steps and code walkthroughs to help new interns ramp up quickly.
